definition: Claude Debussy (1862-1918), French composer
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
virtue/goodness/morality/ethics/kindness/favor/character/kind
tiger stripes/tiger cub/(old) classifier for troops

sentences.english: The background music, Moonlight, was from Claude Debussy (1862-1918). I feel the harp in it, maybe.
sentences.chinese: 德彪西的《月光》，我似乎感受到了豎琴的音色。

sentences.english: France Musician Debussy is the music master of impressionism.
sentences.chinese: 法國音樂家德彪西，被稱爲印象派音樂大師。

sentences.english: Debussy was the founder of impressionistic music.
sentences.chinese: 德彪西是印象主義音樂的奠基人。

sentences.english: More than that, he paved the way for Debussy and Ravel in our own century.
sentences.chinese: 而且，他爲法國本國的德彪西和拉威爾鋪了路。
